name: Token Teknoloji A.Ş. Token Play
description: Token Play (TPLAY), launched by Token Teknoloji A.Ş., in 2022, is a thematic basket token that includes multiple cryptocurrencies. This innovative token represents a portfolio of the best play-to-earn tokens that are weighted by experts. TPLAY offers its investors an easy and secure way to take the leap into the emerging blockchain gaming world. Due to its structure which includes various play-to-earn tokens, TPLAY makes it possible to trade a whole portfolio of play-to-earn coins with a single click of a button. With this structure, TPLAY is able to minimise the commission fee costs incurred when trading a large number of cryptocurrencies and creates the opportunity to manage a play-to-earn portfolio not only more easily but also more cost-effectively. TPLAY, which has advantages such as simple trading, effective market monitoring and low cost, was created on Avax C-Chain. The cryptocurrencies contained in TPLAY and their weights are regularly shared transparently on token.com.tr.
